entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
